about.value: Software architect with over 6 years of experience specializing in C++ (11-17), Linux, git, Docker, and CMake. Proven expertise in system and detailed design, software development, and ASPICE implementation for automotive clients including Daimler AG, Volkswagen AG, and Ceer Motors.

suggestions.value: Software architect (6+ yrs) with expertise in C++, Linux, git, Docker, and CMake; led system design and ASPICE implementation for automotive projects at Luxoft and Global Logic.
